title: Make Barrie Schwortz Custodian of the Shroud of Turin?
post: Why not make Francis Destefano the Shroud’s custodian?
author: Jim Smith

title: Make Barrie Schwortz Custodian of the Shroud of Turin?
post: YES, I AGREE, THE VATICAN SHOULD DECARE THAT MR. FRANCIS DE STEFANO BECOME THE SHROUD’S NEW CUSTODIAN AND PERHAPS BE VOTED IN AS THE NEXT POPE AS WELL.
author: Norman Bates

title: Make Barrie Schwortz Custodian of the Shroud of Turin?
post: Congratulations to Francis DeStefano upon being elected the new Pope.
author: Norman Bates

title: Make Barrie Schwortz Custodian of the Shroud of Turin?
author: Ed Gein
